description: A Haibane from http://anidb.net/ch26012 [Abandoned Factory], and a close friend of http://anidb.net/ch14492 [Hyouko]. Has an ongoing grudge against http://anidb.net/ch9899 [Reki] for her past endangerment of Hyouko, but is willing to talk with http://anidb.net/ch9898 [Rakka] and others.
name: Midori
